column1: Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering
column5: Electrical engineering is one of the newer branches of engineering, and dates back to the late 19th century. It is the branch of engineering that deals with the technology of electricity. Electrical engineers work on a wide range of components, devices and systems, from the power systems that bring electricity to our homes and communication systems that allow us to keep in touch with family and friends, to the electronic devices, computers, sensors and medical equipment that shape our everyday lives.
